location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 50 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Shiraz, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting clarification from the Governor of Bombay as to whether the Resident or the Senior Marine Officer has the ultimate authority to direct the naval squadron in the Persian Gulf.
